name: Bakunawa
shortLoreBlurb: Bakunawa is a monster from Philippines associated with sea serpent, moon eater. Serpentine power signifies both protection and peril at liminal places. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain.

description: Bakunawa is a monster from Philippines associated with sea serpent, moon eater. Serpentine power signifies both protection and peril at liminal places. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain.
